name: In Search of Paradise
description:
NOTE: There is a new version of this game:

In Search Of Paradise - 2017 Edition

Far from the metropolises of the modern world, to one of the lesser-visited stretches of the American interstate system, a traveler has arrived, in search of Paradise.

In Search of Paradise is an open world driving adventure, made in 16 days for the Idle Thumbs Wizard Jam 2016, based on this Idle Weekend episode.

"Driving across the desert sands, hand on the wheel, sun in my eyes, car in the air, oh god, my car's in the air, I'm crashing, oh God, help I'm crashing."

-Brendan Caldwell, Rock Paper Shotgun

Developed by Henrik Hermans

3D Models by Root

Soundeffects by Akidu

Music by Badatstuff

Changelog

v1.1: Improved car textures, improvements to camera control with mouse, minor landscape alterations.

v1.2: A few minor tweaks. Added some new landscape.
